backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, residents, medical info types, and authorization-aware getters and mutations for profile data.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report linking implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence flags.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to brief functional descriptions for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, light/dark themes, and global background/text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root container and loading the main React module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application wrapper handling routing, identity initialization, profile setup, boot error detection, and conditional rendering.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: ADL tab component that lists activities-of-daily-living records and provides a button to add new entries when permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form allowing users to input and submit new ADL records with required fields validated.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Shows initialization errors with retry and logout options, including expandable error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for entering and saving a new user profile with name, role, and optional related resident IDs.
Provides the app layout with login/logout handling and header/footer structure.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records with medication lookup and optional modal to add new records.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal for creating a MAR record by selecting active medications and entering administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medication lists with optional actions to add, edit, discontinue, or reactivate medications.
Displays a resident's medications, allowing adding, editing, and discontinuing entries using query hooks and modals.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal form to create a new medication with dosage, route, times, physician, and notes, then submits via mutation.
Modal for editing an existing medication's details and saving updates through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Renders a badge showing a resident's code status (DNR or Full Code) with conditional styling.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal for creating a new resident with fields for personal info, physicians, contacts, medications, and related data.
Modal form for editing resident details, physicians, and pharmacy info, then submitting updates via useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a printable report of a resident including demographics, physicians, pharmacy info, and medications.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a resident’s recorded daily vitals in a table and allows adding new vitals if permitted.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal for entering and submitting new daily vital sign measurements for a resident.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and logic for Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, stats, medications, vitals, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor using react-query with identity support and optional admin token setup, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, global styles, and detailed print-specific rules.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Provides helper functions for checking user permissions and mapping user types to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Displays a searchable, filterable dashboard of residents with summary stats and an option to add new residents.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Shows detailed resident information with tabs, editing and medication management modals, and permission checks.
frontend/src/utils/dateOnly.ts: Implements timezone-safe date parsing and age calculation along with age formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and architectural notes for age computation.
